name: Light Factory (refsa)
description:
Light Factory - A factory building game to produce light

The three base colors, Red, Green and Blue, can be gathered from nodes in the world. These can in turn be made into Cyan, Yellow and Magenta. Create all the colors and upgrade their intensity to reach the ultimate goal, build The Prism.

Source Code: https://github.com/Refsa/LightFactory

Controls:

  • Show Tutorial: F1
  • Quit: F3
  • Pan Camera: Right Mouse Button and Drag
  • Zoom Camera: Scroll Wheel
  • Precision snap when placing objects or moving/rotating them: Hold Shift
  • Place objects and Interact: Left Mouse Button
  • Cancel Action: Escape
